text: Chiihphado wichiieng pha hamangkhliie è awairo thu-ung thud mage. Uomrang pha hasiang re-è, chiih-è uomrang pha habie re-è, chiih-è uomrang pha dadiangthek re-è jiarang shiine diig thog dun, ji è uomrang pha khlieng ithek ro re-è jiarang ro ichuang ne san dun; thiisa hàne uomrang pha inai nane uomrang pha habiu re-è jiarang ne ichuang oi pha rey dun.
